rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception
rooms.description: A modern welcoming entrance with ample lighting, integrated security system, and comfortable seating area.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: A seamless integration of kitchen and living space featuring state-of-the-art appliances, high-end finishes, and Vastu-compliant layout to promote positive energy flow. The living area includes a comfortable seating arrangement, entertainment system, and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A private guest room with integrated storage, ensuring comfort for visitors while maintaining luxury aesthetics.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A modern fitness zone equipped with high-end gym equipment, soundproofing, and climate control. Designed to be functional yet seamlessly integrated into the house.

openings.description: A spacious entryway that leads from outdoors to indoors while adhering to local building norms and providing security.
Glass doors connecting the living area with an outdoor balcony, promoting natural ventilation and light.
